TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FaultException extends System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException

summary.span: 表示 SOAP 错误。

span.span: Represents a SOAP fault.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在服务中，使用 类创建非类型化错误以返回到客户端用于调试。In a service, use the class to create an untyped fault to return to the client for debugging purposes. 在客户端，捕获 对象以处理未知或一般性错误，例如将 属性设置为 `true` 时由服务返回的错误。In a client, catch objects to handle unknown or generic faults, such as those returned by a service with the property set to `true`. 因为 扩展 ，所以如果您要分别捕获对象，请记住先捕获所有的 对象，再捕获 对象。Because extends , remember to catch any objects prior to catching objects if you want to catch them separately. > [!NOTE] > 双工服务也能从它们与双工客户端的交互中捕获 对象。Duplex services can also catch objects returned from their interaction with a duplex client. 一般而言，强烈建议您在决定客户端需要错误信息的所有错误情况下，使用 设计服务以返回强类型 SOAP 错误（且非托管异常对象）。In general, it is strongly recommended that you use the to design your services to return strongly-typed SOAP faults (and not managed exception objects) for all fault cases in which you decide the client requires fault information. 是在以下情况中，请使用 ：However, use the in the following situations: - 从服务中发送 SOAP 错误以用于调试。To send SOAP faults from a service for debugging purposes. - 当错误不是服务协定的一部分时，在客户端捕获 SOAP 错误。To catch SOAP faults on a client when the faults are not part of the service contract. 如果希望字符串传递到构造函数后由客户端通过调用 方法对其进行检索时，则引发 对象。Throw objects when you want the string to be passed to the constructor and retrieved by the client by calling the method. 如果指定了 类型的错误协定，其中类型参数为 ，那么字符串值可用作 属性，并且不是通过调用 。If you specify a fault contract of type where the type parameter is , the string value is available as the property and not by calling . 有关详细信息，请参阅[指定和处理在协定和服务中的错误](~/docs/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services.md)。For details, see [Specifying and Handling Faults in Contracts and Services](~/docs/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用 try/catch 块捕获和处理从服务引发的 对象。The following code example shows the use of a try/catch block to catch and handle objects thrown from a service. 这通常在服务应用程序中启用调试时发生。This often occurs when debugging is turned on in the service application. [!code-csharp[IErrorHandler#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/ierrorhandler/cs/client.cs#3)] [!code-vb[IErrorHandler#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/ierrorhandler/vb/client.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.ServiceModel.FaultException CreateFault (System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault messageFault, params Type[] faultDetailTypes);
.method public static hidebysig class System.ServiceModel.FaultException CreateFault(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault messageFault, class System.Type[] faultDetailTypes) cil managed
public: static System::ServiceModel::FaultException ^ CreateFault(System::ServiceModel::Channels::MessageFault ^ messageFault, ... cli::array <Type ^> ^ faultDetailTypes);

param.name: messageFault
param.span: 包含默认 SOAP 错误信息的消息错误。

span.span: The message fault that contains default SOAP fault information.

param.name: faultDetailTypes
param.span: 包含错误详细信息的类型的数组。

span.span: An array of types that contains fault details.

summary.span: 从指定的消息错误和详细信息类型的数组返回 对象。

span.span: Returns a object from the specified message fault and an array of detail types.

returns.span: 一个 对象，您可以引发该对象以指示已收到 SOAP 错误消息。

span.span: A object that you can throw to indicate that a SOAP fault message was received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `faultDetailTypes` 参数包含候选详细信息类型。The `faultDetailTypes` parameter contains candidate detail types. 如果 `faultDetailTypes` 中的任何一个具有与 `messageFault` 参数匹配的架构，则 返回到该类型参数与候选类型匹配的位置。If any of the `faultDetailTypes` has a schema that matches the `messageFault` parameter, a is returned where the type parameter is the matching candidate type.

span.span: A object that you can throw to indicate that a SOAP fault message was received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `faultDetailTypes` 参数包含候选详细信息类型。The `faultDetailTypes` parameter contains candidate detail types. 如果 `faultDetailTypes` 中的任何一个具有与 `messageFault` 参数匹配的架构，则 返回到该类型参数与候选类型匹配的位置。If any of the `faultDetailTypes` has a schema that matches the `messageFault` parameter, a is returned where the type parameter is the matching candidate type.

span.span: For objects that result from fault messages, this object is the fault that arrives.
